name: Rawisland
description:
Rawisland is a desert island adventure. You have to go to a desert island and find hidden treasures. Crafting items and unique upgrades scattered throughout the island will help you survive.



Unlock the island piece by piece by purchasing lands. On every piece of land a tree, stone or bush may appear. The player has 3 items: an axe, a pickaxe and a sword. You can use an ax to chop down trees. Use a pickaxe to mine stone and other minerals, and use a sword to fight off enemies. From the extracted resources you can create various materials and craft new items. The player will also have to find and upgrade coin factories.

To get to the treasures, you will have to open the island piece by piece, risking running into serious opponents in the form of skeletons that live on these lands. To win, the player must buy all the islands and upgrade all the factories to the end.
